shot.composition: Medium tracking shot, 50mm lens, shot on RED V-Raptor 8K with Netflix-approved HDR setup, shallow depth of field
shot.camera_motion: smooth Steadicam walk-along, slight handheld bounce for naturalistic rhythm
shot.film_grain: clean digital with film-emulated LUT for warmth and vibrancy

subject.description: A young woman with a petite frame and soft porcelain complexion. She has oversized, almond-shaped eyes with long lashes, subtle pink-tinted cheeks, and a heart-shaped face. Her inky-black bob is slightly tousled and clipped to one side with a small red strawberry hairpin.
subject.wardrobe: Crocheted ivory halter with scalloped trim, fitted high-waisted denim shorts, wide tan belt with red enamel star buckle, oversized red gingham blouse slipped off one shoulder

scene.location: a quiet urban street bathed in early morning sunlight
scene.environment: empty sidewalks, golden sunlight reflecting off puddles and windows, occasional birds fluttering by, street slightly wet from overnight rain

visual_details.action: she walks rhythmically down the sidewalk, swinging her hips slightly with the beat, one hand gesturing playfully, the other adjusting her shirt sleeve as she sings
visual_details.props: morning mist, traffic light turning green in the distance, reflective puddles, subtle sun flare

cinematography.lighting: natural golden-hour lighting with soft HDR bounce, gentle lens flare through morning haze
cinematography.notes: STRICTLY NO on-screen subtitles, lyrics, captions, or text overlays. Final render must be clean visual-only.

audio.ambient: city birds chirping, distant traffic hum, her boots tapping pavement

voice.style: pop-rap delivery in Japanese with flirtatious rhythm, confident breath control, playful pacing and bounce

audio.lyrics: ラーメンはもういらない、キャビアだけでいいの。 ファイナンスのおかげで、私、星みたいに輝いてる。

original_json.color_palette: sun-warmed pastels with vibrant reds and denim blues, soft contrast with warm film LUT

dialogue.line: ラーメンはもういらない、キャビアだけでいいの。 ファイナンスのおかげで、私、星みたいに輝いてる。

prohibited_elements: any written language appearing on screen

converted_veo_prompt: Shot composition: Medium tracking shot, 50mm lens, shot on RED V-Raptor 8K with Netflix-approved HDR setup, shallow depth of field. Camera movement: smooth Steadicam walk-along, slight handheld bounce for naturalistic rhythm. Frame rate: 24fps. Film quality: clean digital with film-emulated LUT for warmth and vibrancy. Subject: A young woman with a petite frame and soft porcelain complexion. She has oversized, almond-shaped eyes with long lashes, subtle pink-tinted cheeks, and a heart-shaped face. Her inky-black bob is slightly tousled and clipped to one side with a small red strawberry hairpin.. Wardrobe: Crocheted ivory halter with scalloped trim, fitted high-waisted denim shorts, wide tan belt with red enamel star buckle, oversized red gingham blouse slipped off one shoulder. Location: a quiet urban street bathed in early morning sunlight. Time of day: early morning. Environment: empty sidewalks, golden sunlight reflecting off puddles and windows, occasional birds fluttering by, street slightly wet from overnight rain. Action: she walks rhythmically down the sidewalk, swinging her hips slightly with the beat, one hand gesturing playfully, the other adjusting her shirt sleeve as she sings. Props: morning mist, traffic light turning green in the distance, reflective puddles, subtle sun flare. Lighting: natural golden-hour lighting with soft HDR bounce, gentle lens flare through morning haze. Visual tone: playful, stylish, vibrant. Production notes: STRICTLY NO on-screen subtitles, lyrics, captions, or text overlays. Final render must be clean visual-only.. Ambient audio: city birds chirping, distant traffic hum, her boots tapping pavement. Voice tone: light, teasing, and melodic. Voice style: pop-rap delivery in Japanese with flirtatious rhythm, confident breath control, playful pacing and bounce. Lyrics: ラーメンはもういらない、キャビアだけでいいの。 ファイナンスのおかげで、私、星みたいに輝いてる。. Color palette: sun-warmed pastels with vibrant reds and denim blues, soft contrast with warm film LUT. Dialogue - Woman (singing in Japanese): ラーメンはもういらない、キャビアだけでいいの。 ファイナンスのおかげで、私、星みたいに輝いてる。. No subtitles or text overlays. Prohibited visual elements: subtitles, captions, karaoke-style lyrics, text overlays, lower thirds, any written language appearing on screen.
command:
python main.py generate \
    --mission "Create a cinematic Japanese street scene video: Shot composition: Medium tracking shot, 50mm lens, shot on RED V-Raptor 8K with Netflix-approved HDR setup, shallow depth of field. Camera movement: smooth Steadicam walk-along, slight handheld bounce..." \
    --duration 8 \
    --platform instagram \
    --session-id json-demo-20250729_141342 \
    --no-cheap \
    --visual-style "cinematic professional RED camera 8K"
